name: "The Keep of SIN"
description: Ok, this the first in a series of pwads in the 'SIN' series. In this level, teleport in to the Keep of YamanLamanLa (King of Sin and the man who opened the gate to bring the demons to earth to begin with) in an attempt to assassinate him and stop the madness. Problem is.. he has for-seen this move, and is no where to be found, but he has left plenty of Baddies in his place.. Time to clean house.
